enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Parties considered implications of the establishment of new HCFC-22 facilities seeking to obtain certified emission reductions for the destruction of HFC-23.
The EU said CDM projects should not have significant negative implications for the UNFCCC or Montreal Protocol. CAN INTERNATIONAL urged that new HCFC-22 facilities not be included in the CDM.
Georg B rsting (Norway) will chair a contact group.
